description: The Windflower (Anemone blanda 'White Splendour') is a truly amazing plant. Its delicate white petals, each with a bright yellow centre, create a dazzling display of colour in the garden. It is a low-maintenance plant that grows quickly and blooms for many months during the summer season. Even though it prefers full sun, it can still thrive during the cooler months of autumn and spring, adding an invaluable addition to any garden. Its easy-to-grow nature combined with its vibrant display makes the Windflower an appealing choice for any gardener.
